BREAST-COMPOSITION: The breast tissue in this mammogram image appears dense, with a heterogeneous distribution of glandular and fibroglandular tissues.
FINDINGS: There is an oval-shaped opacity seen in the upper outer quadrant of the left breast. It measures approximately 10 mm in diameter and has a well-circumscribed margin. No microcalcifications are associated with this finding. This finding is suggestive of a benign fibroadenoma, but short-term follow-up is recommended to confirm stability.
